LanguageData.AF_FailedExperiments.label: <color=#7f0000>bizarre,MEAT</color>
LanguageData.AF_FailedExperiments.description: A huge, disgusting lump of meat, it's emitting a Stronge Psychic Drone of horror and blood! \n\nThese bloodmud can absorb the damage of swords and bullets. Destroy it with 【dynamite】!
